item.title: Replacing my doorbell with a video camera
item.description: So my door bell ran out of battery, and I started wondering if I could use my security camera instead. In retrospect I could have gotten some batteries from the battery drawer, but wheres the fun in that!? So a while back I bought a bunch of Hikvision and Reolink Power over Ethernet (PoE) 4K security cameras. I like them because they only need one wire and have great quality builds for the price.

item.title: Sniffing water out of thin air
item.description: I don’t like having to relying on other people’s computers, aka the cloud, so when I can I selfhost the tools and services I need. But sometimes there isn’t a service to selfhost. This was the case with my mysterious smart water meter which is now enforced by my municipality. After some research I found out that I might be able to get to my precious water data by using a radio dongle.
